DOC.brief_title: AZD1386 Japanese Multiple Ascending Dosing Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male female young ( ≥20 ≤45 year inclusive ) elderly ( ≥65 ≤80 year inclusive ) . Female subject must surgically sterile postmenopausal .
